sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le professeur a commencé à faire l'appel.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The teacher started taking attendance.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gàosu wǒ mùqián de qíngkuàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez me dire la situation actuelle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please tell me the current situation.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez éteindre la lumière.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please turn off the light.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Où est l'ascenseur ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Where is the elevator?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les revenus de l'entreprise ont augmenté.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company's income has increased.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime manger du tofu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like to eat tofu.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a toujours des embouteillages aux heures de pointe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is always traffic jam during rush hour.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle a un style unique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She has a unique style.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Hòulái tā chéng le yī míng yīshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Plus tard, il est devenu médecin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Later, he became a doctor.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai faim.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I am hungry.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我知道怎么对付这个问题。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zhīdào zěnme duìfu zhège wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je sais comment gérer ce problème.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I know how to deal with this problem.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen shì duōnián de lǎo péngyou.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous sommes de vieux amis depuis de nombreuses années.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We have been old friends for many years.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je vais à l'ambassade pour obtenir un visa.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I am going to the embassy to get a visa.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 对于这件事，我有不同的看法。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Duìyú zhè jiàn shì, wǒ yǒu bùtóng de kànfǎ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Concernant cette affaire, j'ai un avis différent.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Regarding this matter, I have a different opinion.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā hěn cōngming, érqiě hěn nǔlì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est intelligent et travailleur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is smart and hardworking.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个游乐场是为儿童设计的。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège yóulèchǎng shì wèi értóng shèjì de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce parc d'attractions est conçu pour les enfants.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This playground is designed for children.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mes écouteurs sont cassés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My earphones are broken.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā fāshāo le, bù néng lái shàngbān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a de la fièvre et ne peut pas venir travailler.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has a fever and can't come to work.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le médecin dit que j'ai besoin de me reposer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The doctor said I need to rest.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这里的食物种类很多样。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèlǐ de shíwù zhǒnglèi hěn duōyàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les types de nourriture ici sont très variés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The types of food here are very diverse.
